subject: Olympic Games (2010)
Westminster Kennel Club Dog Show
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Readers sound off on Tiger Woods’s apology, left-handed Canadians, the opening ceremony of the Winter Games and the Westminster Kennel Club Dog Show.
snippet: Readers sound off on Tiger Woods’s apology, left-handed Canadians, the opening ceremony of the Winter Games and the Westminster Kennel Club Dog Show.
